traits.Magic Resistance: The zorbo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Natural Armor: The zorbo magically absorbs the natural strength of its surroundings, adjusting its Armor Class based on the material it is standing or climbing on: AC 15 for wood or bone, AC 17 for earth or stone, or AC 19 for metal. If the zorbo isn't in contact with any of these substances, its AC is 10.
